sentences.en: Giovanni has the best Parma ham for miles around.
sentences.cn: 方圆数英里内,乔瓦尼的帕尔马火腿最棒.

sentences.en: his ham-fisted efforts to assist her
sentences.cn: 他为了帮她而做出的笨手笨脚的努力

sentences.en: I became a ham radio operator at the age of eleven.
sentences.cn: 我在11岁时成了一名业余无线电操作员。

sentences.en: I was eating ham and Swiss cheese on rye.
sentences.cn: 我正吃夹火腿和瑞士干酪的黑麦面包。

sentences.en: Keegan's team are now seven points clear of West Ham.
sentences.cn: 基冈率领的球队现在领先西汉姆联队7分。

sentences.en: Please give me a slice of ham.
The cook will utilise the leftover ham bone to make soup.
sentences.cn: 厨师要用吃剩的猪腿骨做汤.

sentences.en: The ham frizzled in the frying pan.
sentences.cn: 火腿在煎锅中咝咝作响.

sentences.en: The ham is delicious with avocado.
The villagers sentenced one man to five lashes for stealing a ham from his neighbor.
sentences.cn: 村民们裁定将一名偷邻居火腿的男子鞭打5下。

sentences.en: Thrusting themselves into the spirit of the farce, they ham it up like mad.
sentences.cn: 他们全力投入到这部闹剧中去，极尽搞怪之能事。

sentences.en: Trim the fat off the ham.
Vacuum-packed ham slices should be unwrapped 30 minutes before serving.
sentences.cn: 真空包装的火腿片应在食用前30分钟把包装除去。

words.tran_cn: 过火地表演；拙劣做作地表演（ham的ing形式）
[食品]火腿；业余无线电爱好者；蹩脚演员

trans.tran_cn: 火腿，（旧时的）小镇，村庄，大腿后部，拙劣演员（尤指表演过火者）
trans.tran_en: the upper part of a pig’s leg, or the meat from this that has been preserved with salt or smoke
to perform with too much false emotion when acting
